original_text:
Golden 7s
Ci sono persone che amano le slot futuristiche, ricche di animazioni,  bonus e livelli di gioco, e poi ci sono quelli che invece in una slot ricercano sobrietà e una modalità di gioco perlomeno comprensibile. Se fate parte di questa seconda categoria, allora Golden 7s è una slot che potrebbe suscitare il vostro interesse. Il tema frutta è utilizzato spesso nelle slot machine, ma nonostante questo non smette mai divertire. La grafica di Golden 7s è semplice, i simboli sono ben definiti e risaltano sullo sfondo completamente nero. Non è particolarmente ricca di effetti sonori, è presente soltanto una musica che fa da sottofondo al rumore meccanico dei rulli in rotazione. I tasti  sono disposti ai lati dello schermo e compaiono solo tra uno spin e l’altro. Abbiamo lo Start, la rotella delle impostazioni, il livello della puntata e altri due pulsanti, “Scommetti” e “Incassa”, anche se questi si attivano solo a seguito di una vincita.
Caratteristiche della slot
Classica griglia a 5 rulli e con 4 righe, Golden 7s ha 40 linee di pagamento fisse. La puntata totale minima è di 0,20 € sino a un massimo di 80 €, fatto che la rende apprezzabile sia dai novellini che non amano puntare forte sulle slot ma anche da chi ha l’animo più ardito. Tenendo premuto il tasto Start si accede alla schermata da cui selezionare i giri automatici, da un minimo di 5 a un massimo di 100. Attenzione perché per attivarli è necessario comunque inserire i limiti di vincita o di perdita oltre i quali gli Spin si fermeranno. Dalle impostazioni è poi possibile attivare il turbo per accelerare la rotazione dei rulli o scegliere il “Gioco per mancini” attraverso cui potremo invertire i tasti. Punto debole di questa slot è il basso RTP, pari al 94%, anche se è doveroso ricordare che si tratta di un dato puramente teorico che incide soltanto sui grandi numeri.
Simboli e funzionalità di Golden 7s
Tutte le combinazioni vincenti richiedono almeno 3 simboli uguali e risultano paganti solo quelle da sinistra a destra, a parte il simbolo speciale che per risultare vincente può apparire in qualsiasi posizione. I simboli con valore più basso sono le ciliegie, il limone e l’arancio, seguiti da  prugne, grappoli d’uva, anguria e il 7 rosso.. Il 7 dorato ricompensa con 4 €, sempre tenendo conto della puntata minima. Ciò vuol dire che basterà puntare poco di più per iniziare a vedere cifre importanti per ogni Spin vincente. Il simbolo che paga di più in assoluto è la stella, se si pensa con la nostra puntata di 0,20 € con 5 simboli si vincono ben 500 €! La scritta Wild è il nostro Jolly e sostituisce tutti i numeri tranne la stella. Golden 7s ci dà anche la possibilità di raddoppiare progressivamente la nostra vincita. Premendo il tasto “Scommetti”, apparirà una pila di importi e alla base la scritta Lose. Importo e scritta Lose si illumineranno in modo alternativo, noi dovremmo essere lesti a cliccare sull’importo. In questo modo saliremo di livello per una nuova opportunità, in caso contrario perderemo la nostra vincita.

raw_translation.response:
Golden 7s

There are those who fancy futuristic slot machines with plenty of animations, bonuses and multiple levels of gameplay. Then, there are those who seek simplicity and understandable gameplay in a slot machine. If you belong to the latter category, then Golden 7s might pique your interest. Although fruity themes are often used in slot machines, they never cease to amuse. The graphics of Golden 7s are sleek, with well-defined symbols popping against the completely black background. The sound effects are not particularly extensive, only accompanied by a background music running alongside the mechanical sounds of the spinning reels. The buttons are placed at the sides of the screen, and only appear between spins. We have the Start button, the Settings wheel, the Betting level, and two other buttons, "Bet" and "Cash out," which only activate upon winning.

Features of the Slot

With a classic grid of 5 reels and 4 rows, Golden 7s has 40 fixed pay lines. The minimum total bet accepted is €0.20 whereas the maximum bet is €80, making it appealing to both beginners who may not want to wager significantly, as well as to players with greater risk preferences. By holding down the Start button, you access the screen where you can select the automatic spins from a minimum of 5 to a maximum of 100. Note that to activate them, it is necessary to input the win or loss limits beyond which the spins will stop. From the settings, you can also activate the turbo to accelerate the rotation of the reels or select the “Left-Handed Game” option through which you can reverse the buttons. The down side of this slot machine is its low RTP, which stands at 94%. However, it is essential to remember that this is a purely theoretical figure that affects only large numbers.

Symbols and Features of Golden 7s

All winning combinations require at least 3 identical symbols, and only those from left to right are winning, except for the special symbol that can appear in any position. The symbols with the lowest value are the cherries, lemon, and orange, followed by plum, grape clusters, watermelon, and the red 7. The golden 7 rewards with €4, taking into account the minimum stake placed. This means that by betting only slightly more, you can begin seeing significant rewards for every winning spin. The highest-paying symbol overall is the star, which, with our €0.20 bet, results in a win of €500 for 5 identical symbols. The "Wild" symbol serves as the wild card and replaces all the numbers except for the star. Golden 7s also offers the chance to double our winnings progressively. By pressing the "Bet" button, a pile of amounts appears, with the word "Lose" at the base. The amount and the word "Lose" light up alternately, and we must be quick to click on the amount. This way, we climb to the next level for a new opportunity, and otherwise, we lose our winnings.

Then, there are those who seek simplicity and understandable gameplay in a slot machine. If you belong to the latter category, then Golden 7s might pique your interest. Although fruity themes are often used in slot machines, they never cease to amuse. The graphics of Golden 7s are sleek, with well-defined symbols popping against the completely black background. The sound effects are not particularly extensive, only accompanied by a background music running alongside the mechanical sounds of the spinning reels. The buttons are placed at the sides of the screen, and only appear between spins. We have the Start button, the Settings wheel, the Betting level, and two other buttons, "Bet" and "Cash out," which only activate upon winning.

Features of the Slot

With a classic grid of 5 reels and 4 rows, Golden 7s has 40 fixed pay lines. The minimum total bet accepted is €0.20 whereas the maximum bet is €80, making it appealing to both beginners who may not want to wager significantly, as well as to players with greater risk preferences. By holding down the Start button, you access the screen where you can select the automatic spins from a minimum of 5 to a maximum of 100. Note that to activate them, it is necessary to input the win or loss limits beyond which the spins will stop. From the settings, you can also activate the turbo to accelerate the rotation of the reels or select the “Left-Handed Game” option through which you can reverse the buttons. The down side of this slot machine is its low RTP, which stands at 94%. However, it is essential to remember that this is a purely theoretical figure that affects only large numbers.

Symbols and Features of Golden 7s

All winning combinations require at least 3 identical symbols, and only those from left to right are winning, except for the special symbol that can appear in any position. The symbols with the lowest value are the cherries, lemon, and orange, followed by plum, grape clusters, watermelon, and the red 7. The golden 7 rewards with €4, taking into account the minimum stake placed. This means that by betting only slightly more, you can begin seeing significant rewards for every winning spin. The highest-paying symbol overall is the star, which, with our €0.20 bet, results in a win of €500 for 5 identical symbols. The "Wild" symbol serves as the wild card and replaces all the numbers except for the star. Golden 7s also offers the chance to double our winnings progressively. By pressing the "Bet" button, a pile of amounts appears, with the word "Lose" at the base. The amount and the word "Lose" light up alternately, and we must be quick to click on the amount. This way, we climb to the next level for a new opportunity, and otherwise, we lose our winnings.

The Start button, Settings wheel, Betting level, and other buttons (Bet and Cash out) are located at the sides of the screen and only appear between spins. Players can select automatic spins from a minimum of 5 to a maximum of 100 by holding down the Start button. The slot machine also offers the option to activate Turbo and Left-Handed Game from the settings.

Pay lines and Betting

There are 40 fixed pay lines in Golden 7s, and the minimum total bet accepted is €0.20, while the maximum is €80. This wide range of bets makes it appealing to both beginners and players with greater risk preferences. Note that to activate automatic spins, players must input the win or loss limits beyond which the spins will stop.

Graphics and Sound Effects

The graphics of Golden 7s are sleek, with well-defined symbols popping against the completely black background. The sound effects are not particularly extensive, only accompanied by a background music running alongside the mechanical sounds of the spinning reels.

Symbols and Payouts

All winning combinations in Golden 7s require at least 3 identical symbols, and only those from left to right are winning, except for the special symbol that can appear in any position. The symbols with the lowest value are the cherries, lemon, and orange, followed by plum, grape clusters, watermelon, and the red 7. The highest-paying symbol overall is the star, which results in a win of €500 for 5 identical symbols. The golden 7 rewards with €4, taking into account the minimum stake placed. The wild symbol of the slot serves as the wild card and replaces all the numbers except for the star. Players can double their winnings progressively by clicking on the pile of amounts that appear when they press the Bet button.

RTP

The RTP of Golden 7s is 94%, which may be considered low compared to other slot machines. However, it is important to remember that this is a theoretical figure that affects only large numbers.
